title: SSL Certificate Generator: Free letsencrypt SSL in minutes - PunchSalad
text: Free SSL Certificate Generator Create a Free Let's Encrypt SSL Certificate in a few minutes (including Wildcard SSL). For step-by-step tutorial with video Check the tutorial. Let's Encrypt certificate is valid for 90 days. You can get a paid SSL for about $9 and it's valid for a year. More info here. This tool was built on top of Afosto's Acme client
